input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer I - C++/Avionics

Location: Phoenix, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Join a team recognized for leadership, innovation and diversity

The future is what you make it.

When you join Honeywell, you become a member of our global team of thinkers, innovators, dreamers and doers who make the things that make the future.

That means changing the way we fly, fueling jets in an eco-friendly way, keeping buildings smart and safe and even making it possible to breathe on Mars.

Working at Honeywell isn’t just about developing cool things. That’s why all our employees enjoy access to dynamic career opportunities across different fields and industries.

Are you ready to help us make the future?

Responsibilities

Be part of highly functioning technical teams assigned to development programs ranging from small to large with a wide range of complexityDevelop Code/software requirements developments, software architecture, and software integration/testingTroubleshoot current software interfaces and performance problemsAssist in coordinating engineering review activities associated with code review, PDR and CDR milestonesAssist in software integration and verification activitiesAble to work with a diverse/global group of team members who could be geographically distributedClearly present the software development status with accurate facts & figuresInterface with management, stakeholders outside of their CoE, Customer Engineering Leads (CEL) as well as Project Engineering for their program/product and other PEs/LSEs within CoE associated with their program/productTravel: up to 25% (US/International)Hybrid work scheduleReports to: Sr Engineering ManagerRelocation support may be provided

U.s. Person Requirements

Due to compliance with U.S. export control laws and regulations, candidate must be a U.S. Person, which is defined as, a U.S. citizen, a U.S. permanent resident, or have protected status in the U.S. under asylum or refugee status

Must be a US Citizen or a GC holder

MUST HAVE

1+ years of combined software product engineering development experience as a technical solution developerBachelor’s degree from an accredited institution in a technical discipline such as the sciences, technology, engineering or mathematics

WE VALUE

Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering or Computer Systems Engineering2 years of avionics platform software engineering experienceExperience working with C/C++Experience working with customers on Software requirementsBackground in Systems design and development Familiarity with Requirements Management Tools Private Pilot License and Flight experience Experience with functional decomposition ARP4754 process knowledgeKnowledge about EPIC platform and applicationsSix Sigma Greenbelt certificationExcellent communication skills

Additional Information

JOB ID: HRD227460Category: EngineeringLocation: 21111 N. 19th Ave (Deer Valley),Phoenix,Arizona,85027,United StatesExemptMust be a US Person or able to obtain export Authorization.

Global (ALL)

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, religion, or veteran status.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
